GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
drm/i915/display: avoid warnings when registering dual panel backlight

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 26eaff38e1fc3366f09676ed6749c8d04e34eb00, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 20f85ef89d94e12041bc9b0a335a0e7d6c61daf7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/i915/display: avoid warnings when registering dual panel backlight
